Kun

Xiaojun

Introduction

WayV-KUN&XIAOJUN (Korean: 웨이브이-쿤&샤오쥔; Japanese: ウェーブイ - クーン＆シャオジュン) is the first duo unit of WAYV which happens to be the sub-unit of NCT. They made their official debut on June 16, 2021 with the digital single "Back to You."
